skins.shipDescription: A-class prototype destroyer ` Amazon, Hull Number D39!
skins.selfIntroduction: Are you listening? Fleet education is important, and I am an old timer in charge of this glorious duty! ...I'm small like a squirt?! That's it! ... Give me ten laps!
skins.acquisition: I am the A-class prototype destroyer, Amazon. As much as I don't want to deal with an idiot like you... I have no choice. I'm gonna look after you!
skins.login: Oy, Commander! I wanted to go outside but I couldn't find anyone to tag along. You, come with me!
skins.details: Well, I'm in a good mood today... I'll let you praise me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You're useless most of the time, but when the time comes, you seem to do alright
skins.secretaryIdle2: Stupid younger ones... They should quickly grow to stop making me worried for them!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Is there something you don't understand? I'll teach you, so be grateful
skins.secretaryTouch: I- I say, you... why are you like this...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aaah! ... You... nose-bleeding pervert in heat!

skins.shipDescription: Selecting me for a retrofit proves that you are a Commander of culture! Heheh, you'd better prepare yourself! From now on, I'll make sure to "take care" of you even more thoroughly!
skins.acquisition: Selecting me for a retrofit proves that you are a Commander of culture! Heheh, you'd better prepare yourself! From now on, I'll make sure to "take care" of you even more thoroughly!
skins.login: Stop sleeping on the job already! Straighten your back, eyes ahead! Sort yourself out!
skins.details: Hmm? Does my post-retrofit appearance interest you *that* much? How hopeless you are! Fine, gaze upon me!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Stop looking at me like I only got this far thanks to you!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I just *have* to look after everyone, don't I! Both the rookies and you, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I-in all fairness, the Commander does a pretty good job most of the time... Ahem! N-never mind that! You just misheard me!
skins.secretaryTouch: U-unannounced intimacy is forbidden, you hear?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Who would've thought I'd get to use my new weapon so soon... Oh, Commander? I hope you've said your prayers!

skins.shipDescription: No ball is complete without its orchestra! Here, as the leader of the Royal Destroyers Philharmonic, I'll be sure to liven up the night! Now to begin... woaaah! I stepped on my mantle?!
skins.acquisition: No ball is complete without its orchestra! Here, as the leader of the Royal Destroyers Philharmonic, I'll be sure to liven up the night! Now to begin... woaaah! I stepped on my mantle?!
skins.login: Commander, though you've still got to get your work done, feel free to enjoy the ball tonight~!
skins.details: Commander, did you come to watch our rehearsal?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm in a good mood today? Of course, it's a party, after all! Hehe~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My sisters snuck off to the party the moment I took my eyes off them. Oh well, I suppose I can overlook it tonight~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, is something on your mind? I'm in a good mood today, so I wouldn't mind helping you~
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah! Hey, what are you doing?! Oh, I was about to step on my mantle? Ah, um, th-thanks...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, control yourself~ I'm in a good mood today, so I won't hurt you too badly~!
